title: Ticket #3090: Improve dagman tests
description:
The dagman tests are having a lot of spurious failures, especially when run in parallel mode. I looked into one test but noticed that it deleted all its output files so it was hard to tell what is going wrong.

The tests should be more robust. Also, they should preserve output files and try to do better logging. I'll be making some changes towards this end.
